3M Polyester Protective Tape 335

    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Mexico

entry.title: 3M 51-4X100-PR - 3M Scotchrap All-Weather Corrosion Protection Tape, 51, printed, black, 20 mil (0.5 mm), 4 in x 100 ft (102 mm x 30.5 m) 51-4X100-PR 7000043017
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 155.84

[shortdesc]

3M Scotchrap All-Weather Corrosion Protection Tape, 51, printed, black, 20 mil (0.5 mm), 4 in x 100 ft (102 mm x 30.5 m)

  • 3M™ Scotchrap™ All-Weather Corrosion Protection Tape 51 is a polyvinyl chloride (PVC) tape with a high-tack adhesive to resist all-weather corrosion of metal piping systems, conduits and fittings above and below the ground
  • The strong and durable tape can be applied in temperatures ranging from -12°C to 65.6°C (10°F to 150°F) and has a service temperature range from -48°C to 80°C (-55°F to 175°F)
  • Metal surfaces must be coated with 3M™ Scotchrap™ Pipe Primer before wrapping with the tape.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Resistant to impacts, abrasions, punctures and tears
  • Can be applied easily without special tools
  • Resistant to common chemicals, soil acids, alkalis and outdoor weathering
  • Highly conformable
  • Surfaces to be wrapped should be clean, dry and free of contaminants

  • Used for corrosion protection on pipes, conduits, fittings and other surfaces
  • Designed for application over a wide temperature range
    		•

entry.summary:

Type: Masking Tapes
Price: 67.56

[shortdesc]

3M Scotchblok Masking Paper, 66724, 24 ft x 750 ft (7.32 m x 228.6 m)

  • 3M™ Scotchblok™ Masking Paper is specially coated to provide excellent resistance to paint solvents, urethanes, base coats, and clear coats
  • The bonded formulation reduces contamination of freshly painted and varnished surfaces with paper fibres, while the highly conformable construction attaches easily to a range of shapes.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotchblok
    Application General/Bulk Masking
    Color Gold
    Length 750 ft
    Width 24 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Masking Tapes

    Product Information

  • Polycoated backing prevents bleed-through
  • Excellent conformability
  • Tightly bonded
  • Offers the best penetration resistance from all solvents used in automotive aftermarket repairs and refinishing
  • Holds up well under wet sanding conditions
  • Available in a variety of sizes
